## Knowledge and skills you bring with you 

![&copy; Monster Ztudio - stock.adobe.com](fig/AdobeStock_408469027.jpeg){alt="Assumptioms"}

- You are familiar with the software development lifecycle, including stages such as requirements gathering, design, analysis, implementation, and testing.
- You are proficient in using Integrated Development Environments (IDEs) and essential development tools like GitHub and the command line.
- You possess programming skills in object-oriented languages, such as Java.
- You have a solid grasp of fundamental math concepts, including basic notation, algebra, trigonometry, and vectors.
- You have a strong understanding of core data structures.


::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::::: keypoints 

This module requires a solid understanding of software development, including object-oriented programming, data structures, and intermediate-level mathematics, particularly in geometry.
